Boil sugar, water, anbd Karo syrup unti it forms a soft ball whien treid in cold water. Beat egg whites till stiff and slowly add 1/2 of syrup mixture, beating constantly. Cook remainder until if forms a hard ball in cold water and add slowly to first mixture. Beat until stiff. Add vanilla and walnuts. Pour onto buttered pan or platter. Cut when cool. Cook in clear weather -- low humidity.
